text: Nils Kurt Erik Einar Grönberg (5 September 2002 – 21 October 2021), better known as Einár, was a Swedish rapper. He was best known for his rap song ”Katten i trakten” Einár was shot dead on 21 October 2021 in Stockholm, which caused a huge outcry in Swedish social media, mainly Instagram. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:2002 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish singers Category:Murders by firearm Category:2021 crimes Category:Kidnapped people Category:Murdered musicians Category:Musicians from Stockholm Category:Pseudonyms Category:Rappers
title: Einár
